channel.title: Skiller-Pkz 718 - || Unique Home! || Come Join Us! || 24/7 || Stable || Economy
channel.description:
[center]
[b][size=18pt]Welcome[/size][/b]
[b][size=14pt]To[/size][/b]
[SIZE=6][IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/cool.png[/img][/SIZE]
[url=http://http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com][img]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/home.png[/img][/url][url=http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/Skiller-Pkz.jar][img]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/download.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/play.html][img]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/playnow-button.png[/img][/url]
[u][size=18pt][b]Why should I play Skiller-Pkz?[/b][/size][/u]
[b]Skiller-Pkz is a 718/742 Economy & Player Killing Server, that has friendly and nice Player/Staff to talk to and train skills with. Skiller-Pkz´s development team is always open to any suggestions, and we have many features in all sorts of types of accounts can raise money, even if you've decided to be a 'skiller' so it does not mean that you can not earn as much money as a fighter does, that's reversed, you make more money when you are a skiller, as you have much to do so as; Making some armours and sell them to the General Store, and you can therefore also sell items to the players and they are sold frequently and the thing is so like; Bars, logs, ores, potions and much more, so at Skiller-Pkz it does not matter, even if you choose to be something other than fighting or pure, it does not mean that you can't raise money at Skiller-Pkz![/b]
[size=14pt][u][b]ServerInformation[/b][/u][/size]
[size=14pt][b]Vote4Cash System! ( Working on it)[/b][/size]
[b][size=14pt]Donation System![/size][/b]
[size=14pt][b]Unique Home![/b][/size]
[size=14pt][b]WE GOT VPS! Stable and No lag[/b][/size]
[size=14pt][b]Friendly Staffs <(*-*)>[/b][/size]
[size=12pt]* Xp modes (easy, medium, hard, insane) * Ganodermic / Grifolic / Fungale / Polypore staff making like real Rs * Whip & Dark bow coloring system * Taniing system * PestQueen * PvP Points + Shop * PvM Points + Shop * Lots of Donator Benefits. * Many Bosses!
* Donator boss * Pest queen * Chaotic claws * -All skills working - 100% Soulwars working like RuneScape! - Item Lending working 100% - Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack! - Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage! - Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling - Pest Control Working Exactly Like RuneScape (100%) - Custom Dungeoneering System - Recipe for Disaster - Dominion Tower with Dominion Factor Points & Shop. - Duel Arena Working just Like RuneScape - Glacors with Working Minions & Double HP Bars - Server Notified when Users get a good Drop - Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins. - Warrior Guild with Defender Drops - Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape - Nice ways to make money - Much much more come online to find out more! - Fight Caves (63 Waves) - Fight Kiln (36 Waves) - Grand Exchange - Clan Chat System - Glacors. - Jadinko Lair. - Ganodermic. - Strykewyrms. - Dagonnoth's. - Armoured Zombies (Training Area). - And more.. - Daily updates[/size]
[size=14pt][b]Pictures![/b][/size]
[B][SIZE=4][U]Unique Home[/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/homes.PNG[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][U]Starter with Different XP Modes![/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/Starter.PNG[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][U]Grand Exchange![/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/ge.PNG[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Player VS Monster[/SIZE][/U][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/Pvm.PNG[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Good PVP System![/SIZE][/U][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/pvp.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/weps.PNG[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Custom Items![/SIZE][/U][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/item.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][U]100% Working Sawmill![/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/sawmill.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][U]Many Bosses![/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/boss.png[/img] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/bosses.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/custom.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][U]SOF[/U][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/Soc.png[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=5]More Coming Soon![/SIZE][/U][/B]
[URL=http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/forum][IMG]http://skiller-pkz.16mb.com/images/joinnow.jpg[/img][/URL]
[/center]

item.description:
@matteskill wrote:

[center]

[size=18pt]Welcome[/size]

[size=14pt]To[/size]

[SIZE=6][/SIZE]

[size=18pt]Why should I play Skiller-Pkz?[/size]

Skiller-Pkz is a 718/742 Economy & Player Killing Server, that has friendly and nice Player/Staff to talk to and train skills with.
Skiller-Pkz´s development team is always open to any suggestions,
and we have many features in all sorts of types of accounts can raise money,
even if you’ve decided to be a ‘skiller’ so it does not mean that you can not earn as much money as a fighter does,
that’s reversed, you make more money when you are a skiller,
as you have much to do so as; Making some armours and sell them to the General Store,
and you can therefore also sell items to the players and they are sold
frequently and the thing is so like; Bars, logs, ores, potions and much more, so at Skiller-Pkz it does not matter,
even if you choose to be something other than fighting or pure,
it does not mean that you can’t raise money at Skiller-Pkz!

[size=14pt]Donation System![/size]

[size=14pt]Unique Home![/size]

  • Warrior Guild with Defender Drops
  • Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape
  • Nice ways to make money

  • Fight Caves (63 Waves)
